# .github/workflows

GitHub Actions CI/CD automation for npm package publication with supply chain provenance attestation.

## Contents

**[publish.yml](./publish.yml)** â€” Triggers on `release.published` and `workflow_dispatch`, executes five-step job: `actions/checkout@v4`, `actions/setup-node@v4` (Node.js 20, npm registry), `npm ci`, `npm run build`, `npm publish --provenance --access public` using `NODE_AUTH_TOKEN` from GitHub secrets. Requires `contents: read` and `id-token: write` permissions for cryptographic attestation linking package to source commit.

## Behavioral Contracts

### Workflow Triggers
```yaml
on:
  release:
    types: [published]
  workflow_dispatch:
```

### Provenance Publication
```bash
npm publish --provenance --access public
# --provenance: generates cryptographic attestation
# --access public: ensures scoped package publicly readable
# NODE_AUTH_TOKEN: injected from ${{ secrets.NPM_TOKEN }}
```

### Node.js Setup
```yaml
- uses: actions/setup-node@v4
  with:
    node-version: '20'
    registry-url: 'https://registry.npmjs.org'
```

### Job Permissions
```yaml
permissions:
  contents: read
  id-token: write  # Required for provenance attestation
```
